creator: Dimoly
descriptionHtml:
Dimoly is an educational platform that helps every student succeed. Whether you're in the classroom, at home, or anywhere in between, Dimoly makes it easy for you to learn and stay updated with your learning progress.

Key Benefits

* Chat and study with a powerful AI assistant that can provide answers to a wide range of subjects and topics,
* Summarize long text to a simpler version using the AI assistant
* Quickly write essays on topics using the AI assistant
* Make queries on things you don't know and a lot more
* Use flashcards to quickly memorize everything you study
* Answer and test yourself with past GCE exam questions
* Manage your studying habit with a time table scheduler
* Track your learning progress
* With Dimoly, the possibilities are endless

Join other students, educators, parents and individuals using Dimoly now and take control of your potential!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Flashcard creation bug fix
- Live notifications
- View and manage your chat history with the AI assistant
- Improved user experience
- Sign up bug fix
